imdb.plot outline: Learn the alphabet with Olive and the Rhyme Rescue Crew. Created by the Emmy Award-winning Peach Blossom Media, and head-writer of Mickey Mouse Clubhouse, Leslie Valdes, this unique series teaches the alphabet using your favourite nursery rhymes. Every episode is designed to engage and enrich your young audience, teaching them interesting and useful vocabulary through song and dance. Created by the Emmy Award-winning Peach Blossom Media, and head-writer of Mickey Mouse Clubhouse, Leslie Valdes, this unique series teaches the alphabet using your favourite nursery rhymes. Every episode is designed to engage and enrich your young audience, teaching them interesting and useful vocabulary through song and dance.
